com.kontakt.sdk.android.ble.manager.listeners

Interface SecureProfileListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleSecureProfileListener

    public interface SecureProfileListener
    Listener used to report Kontakt.io secure profiles scanning results.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onProfileDiscovered(ISecureProfile profile)
      Called when secure profile is discovered for the first time.
      void onProfileLost(ISecureProfile profile)
      Called when secure profile is reported lost (out of range).
      void onProfilesUpdated(java.util.List<ISecureProfile> profiles)
      Called when secure profiles are updated.

    • Method Detail

      • onProfileDiscovered

        void onProfileDiscovered(ISecureProfile profile)
        Called when secure profile is discovered for the first time. This will be called only once per scan or after profile is reported lost.
        Parameters:
        profile - the Kontakt.io secure profile.

      • onProfilesUpdated

        void onProfilesUpdated(java.util.List<ISecureProfile> profiles)
        Called when secure profiles are updated.
        Parameters:
        profiles - the Kontakt.io secure profiles.

      • onProfileLost

        void onProfileLost(ISecureProfile profile)
        Called when secure profile is reported lost (out of range). onProfileDiscovered will be called when beacon is back in range.
        Parameters:
        profile - the Kontakt.io secure profile.
